org.livingdoc.config

Class YamlUtils

  • org.livingdoc.config.YamlUtils

  • public class YamlUtils

    Tools to parse yaml configurations into typed objects or extract generic configuration objects form InputStream.

    See Also:
    InputStream

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static YamlUtils INSTANCE

        Tools to parse yaml configurations into typed objects or extract generic configuration objects form InputStream.

        See Also:
        InputStream

    • Method Detail

      • loadFromStream

        @NotNull
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> loadFromStream(@NotNull
                                                                                java.io.InputStream inputStream)

        Reads the configuration data from the given InputStream. The stream needs to contain valid YAML data. After reading, the stream is closed.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - the stream to read
        Returns:
        the read configuration data as a Map
        See Also:
        InputStream

      • loadFromStreamAs

        @NotNull
public <T> T loadFromStreamAs(@NotNull
                                       java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                       @NotNull
                                       kotlin.reflect.KClass<T> type)

        Reads the configuration data from the given InputStream as an instance of the given type. The stream needs to contain valid YAML data. After reading, the stream is closed.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - the stream to read
        Returns:
        the read configuration data as a Map
        See Also:
        InputStream

      • toObject

        @NotNull
public <T> T toObject(@NotNull
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> configData,
                               @NotNull
                               kotlin.reflect.KClass<T> type)

        Creates an instance of the given type based on the provided configData.

        If there is no data for a field of the given type, the type's default will be used.

        Parameters:
        configData - the raw data to be used when creating the instance
        type - the type of object to create
        Returns:
        the created object instance
